body:
How about refactoring those three lines into another function?

Since the checks happen after `if (sizes == NULL)` and `if (THLongTensor_nDimension(indices) == 0 && THTensor_(nDimension)(values) == 0)`, and those are required in both the safe and unsafe versions, it doesn't feel good to call the unsafe version from the safe one.
